gui.logic

Class FSTextfieldLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.logic.FSTextfieldLogic

  • public class FSTextfieldLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class pourpose is to handle the textField input for some user cases, this class is primary used to handle the informartion input for check the input, disallow non digits input, and enable/disable some GUI feature
    Author:
    Meschio
